pp2.3:17.2: nelā → neḷā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | pemanīyā → pemaniyā (sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed, csp2ed)
pp2.3:18.3: duṭṭhāruko → duṭṭhārukā (bj) | kaṭhalāya → kaṭhalena kathalāya (mr); kathalena (aṭṭha.) | ghaṭṭito → ghaṭṭitā (bj) | āsavaṁ deti → assandati (bj)
pp2.3:24.2: gantā → gato (si); gantvā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | dhammassavaṇāya → dhammasavanāya (bj, pts-vp-pli1); dhammassavanāya (sya-all)
pp2.3:32.2: saṁsandatimeva → … ceva (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | sandhiyatimeva → … ceva (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | sammodatimeva → … ceva (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
pp2.3:33.12: Yesaṁ kho pana so → yesaṁ kho pana (sabbattha) | paṭiggaṇhāti → patigaṇhāti (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
